title: Get Products Request
description: Request parameters for discovering available advertising products. Use buying_mode for initial discovery, or product_ids to refresh forecasts for known products.

buying_mode.description: Declares buyer intent for this request. 'brief': publisher curates product recommendations from the provided brief. 'wholesale': buyer requests raw inventory to apply their own audiences â€” brief must not be provided. When buying_mode is 'wholesale', publishers return only products that support buyer-directed targeting and omit proposals.

brief.description: Natural language description of campaign requirements. Required when buying_mode is 'brief'. Must not be provided when buying_mode is 'wholesale'. When combined with product_ids, provides context for forecast refinement (e.g., 'Update forecast for $100k budget targeting California').

product_ids.description: Specific product IDs to retrieve, from a previous get_products response. Skips discovery and returns only these products with updated forecasts. Combine with brief and/or filters to provide context for forecast generation (e.g., different budget, dates, or targeting).

brand.description: Brand reference for product discovery context. Resolved to full brand identity at execution time.

catalog.description: Catalog of items the buyer wants to promote. The seller matches catalog items against its inventory and returns products where matches exist. Supports all catalog types: a job catalog finds job ad products, a product catalog finds sponsored product slots. Reference a synced catalog by catalog_id, or provide inline items.

account.description: Account for product lookup. Returns products with pricing specific to this account's rate card.

buyer_campaign_ref.description: Buyer's campaign reference label. Groups related discovery and buy operations under a single campaign for CRM and ad server correlation (e.g., 'NovaDrink_Meals_Q2').

property_list.description: [AdCP 3.0] Reference to an externally managed property list. When provided, the sales agent should filter products to only those available on properties in the list.
